alert.note: Alert for Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 11 at 1:18PM PST until December 15 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Lincoln County. * WHEN...From 4 AM Tuesday to 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible with areas of blowing and drifting snow possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow level may fluctuate between 5000 and 6000 feet during the day Tuesday, with snow levels falling again Tuesday evening. US-93 Between Pioche and Caliente will observe areas heavy snow as well as Coyote Springs Summit. SR-319 and Eagle Valley Road will also be impacted.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
